glsa.title: Tikiwiki: SQL injection and multiple XSS vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: An SQL injection vulnerability and multiple XSS vulnerabilities have been discovered.

background.p: Tikiwiki is a web-based groupware and content management system (CMS), using PHP, ADOdb and Smarty.

description.p: Tikiwiki fails to properly sanitize user input before processing it, including in SQL statements.

impact.p: An attacker could execute arbitrary SQL statements on the underlying database, or inject arbitrary scripts into the context of a user's browser.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Tikiwiki users should upgrade to the latest version:
